price: នោះគឺជាការប្រោសប្រទានពីអល់ឡោះ។ គ្រប់គ្រាន់ ហើយអល់ឡោះជាអ្នកដែលដឹងបំផុត។
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
